name: The Lost Robot - Jigsaw Puzzle Stories
name_original: The Lost Robot - Jigsaw Puzzle Stories
description:
• Discover a mysterious story behind this puzzle told through 22 images
  • At each completed stage, a new information about the narrative will be revealed.
  • Each image with three difficulty options.

  • A variety of tools make it easy to organize your memories.

  • Enjoy the grayscale cartooned illustrations while listening to an original soundtrack.
